trans-unit.source: Contains data associated with the termination of a workflow instance.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs is generated by the runtime tracking infrastructure when a workflow instance is terminated.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]A futtatókörnyezet infrastruktúra dokumentumkövetést, miközben a munkafolyamat-példányok megszakadt egy TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs állítja elő.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associated with a workflow instance includes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> configured for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent><xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>, the workflow tracking infrastructure puts the TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> that it sends to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Ha a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>tartozó munkafolyamattal példányt tartalmaz egy <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>konfigurált egy <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent><xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>, a munkafolyamat-infrastruktúra visszahelyezi a TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs követési <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A>a a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>a nyomkövetési szolgáltatás részére küldött.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>

trans-unit.source: A workflow instance may be terminated in one of three ways: the host may call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> activity may be invoked from inside the workflow instance; or an unhandled exception may occur.
trans-unit.target: A munkafolyamat-példányok három módon lehet megszüntetni: az állomás hívhatja <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>tevékenység előfordulhat, hogy hívható meg a munkafolyamat-példány; belül, vagy nem kezelt kivétel fordulhat elő.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the workflow is terminated by the host or a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> activity, the runtime tracking infrastructure sets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> to a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> that has its <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to a description of the reason for the termination.
trans-unit.target: Ha a munkafolyamat megszakad, a gazdagép által vagy egy <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>tevékenység, a futtatókörnyezet infrastruktúra beállítása követési <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>való egy <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException>, amely rendelkezik a <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>tulajdonságának beállítása a megszűnés ok leírása.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>

trans-unit.source: If the workflow is terminated because of an unhandled exception, the runtime tracking infrastructure passes the unhandled exception in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Ha a munkafolyamat nem kezelt kivétel miatt megszakadt, a futtatókörnyezet követési infrastruktúra megfelel-e a nem kezelt kivétel a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs is used only by the runtime tracking service to pass information in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs használják csak a nyomkövetési szolgáltatás futásidejű át az információkat a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>

trans-unit.source: The data for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=fullName> event is passed in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.
Gets the exception that caused the workflow instance to be terminated.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a kivételt, ami miatt a munkafolyamat-példány ér véget.

trans-unit.source: When the workflow instance is terminated because of an unhandled exception, Exception contains the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: Ha a munkafolyamat-példány nem kezelt kivétel miatt megszakadt, a kivétel a nem kezelt kivétel tartalmazza.

trans-unit.source: When the workflow instance is terminated by either a host call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> activity, Exception contains a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> that has its <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to a description of the reason for the termination.
trans-unit.target: Amikor megszakadt a munkafolyamat-példány hívásával vagy állomás <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>vagy egy <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>tevékenység, kivétel tartalmaz egy <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException>, amely rendelkezik a <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>tulajdonságának beállítása a megszűnés ok leírása.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the host terminates the workflow instance, it supplies this description in the `string` parameter to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; if the workflow instance is terminated by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>, the description is supplied by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Ha a gazdagép áll le a munkafolyamat-példányhoz, átadja ezt a leírást a `string` <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; Ha a munkafolyamat-példányhoz egy <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>a leírás <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName> által biztosított</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> paramétert

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName> that caused the workflow instance to be terminated.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Exception?displayProperty=fullName> , amely miatt a munkafolyamat-példány ér véget.
